mapper.select: SELECT customer_no customerNo, customer_id customerId FROM customer WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} AND customer_pw = #{customerPw} AND customer_active = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) FROM customer WHERE customer_id = #{idCk}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_detail( customer_no, customer_name, customer_gender, customer_phone, customer_address, customer_email )VALUES( #{customerNo}, #{customerName}, #{customerGender}, #{customerPhone}, #{customerAddress}, #{customerEmail} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.customer_no customerNo, c.customer_id customerId, cd.customer_name customerName, cd.customer_gender customerGenger, cd.customer_height customerHeight, cd.customer_weight customerWeight, cd.customer_phone customerPhone, cd.customer_address customerAddress, cd.customer_email customerEmail FROM customer c INNER JOIN customer_detail cd ON c.customer_no = cd.customer_no WHERE c.customer_no = #{customerNo}
